info.title: Closable Alert
info.description: Alerts can be closable. Including a closeable prop displays a close button and lets the alert handle onClose. Be careful not to overuse closable alerts. They still interrupte the user flow and lead to the opposite of progressive disclosure: a lot of information at first sight that progressively goes away.
